Description: Array to store the integer elements entered by the user.
Stores the size of the array, input by the user.
Used for taking user input from the console.
Temporary variable that holds the current element being compared during the insertion sort process.
Pointer used to traverse the array from the current position backward during the sorting process.
Loop counter variable used for iterating through the array elements in the accept, sort, and display methods.
Object of the Main class used to call methods (accept, sort, and display) for array input, sorting, and displaying the sorted array.
